intro: ^The feathered friend got to the top of Youkai Mountain.
^Aya Mystia. Other friends. I'm so glad you made it.
^We sure did and it was quite fun.
^Let's get settled and set up. The party is about to begin.
^Mystia and her freiends help set up her Izakaya her food stand.
^Later on the party was in full swing.
^Aya, I wanna thank you for helping me.
^And I wanna thank you for helping me get all these guests for the party.
